name: Sequence Plus
description:
Sequence+ is a cool version of the classic memory sequence game, with a couple of new twists.

It's fully customizable - change the skin, change the background, change the sounds - it's all up to you.

And did we mention twists? Well, we mean that literally - enable the rotation mode and after each successful sequence, the board rotates 90 degrees. Or for an extra challenge, try the random mode - each time you get a sequence correct, the segments move to a random position!!

There is also a high-score table to keep track of your progress, and three skill levels - just in case it gets too hard for you!
